channel.title: Edd Mann
channel.description: I make stuff for the web, and occasionally ramble about it here.

item.title: Solving the Advent of Code 2023 calendar in Kotlin and Swift
item.description: This article documents my experience solving the Advent of Code 2023 calendar using both Kotlin and Swift

item.title: Building a Secret Santa Draw PWA in React and TypeScript
item.description: This article documents my experience building a Progress Web Application which performs Secret Santa draws in both a local and remote setting

item.title: Building a Running Calculator PWA in React and TypeScript
item.description: This article documents my experience building a Progress Web Application which calculates running pace, time and distance, along with common-place imperial/metric measurement conversions

item.title: Rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust, Part 4 - Distribution
item.description: This series of articles documents my experience rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust; in this article I will document how the language/runtimes were built, tested and distributed using a custom CI/CD pipeline

item.title: Rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust, Part 3 - Performance
item.description: This series of articles documents my experience rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust; in this article I delve into how I went about benchmarking the two implementations (TypeScript/Node and Rust), greatly improving performance and highlighting interesting findings along the way

item.title: Rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust, Part 2 - Runtimes
item.description: This series of articles documents my experience rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust; in this article I delve into how I went about integrating the core language library with the desired (delivery) runtimes

item.title: Rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust, Part 1 - Implementing the Core
item.description: This series of articles documents my experience rewriting the santa-lang interpreter in Rust; in this article I delve into how I organised the project and built the core language

item.title: Determining your closest Parkrun Alphabet Challenge using Python and pandas
item.description: This article documents my exploration into using Python and pandas to determine the closest Parkrun Alphabet Challenge for a given local run

item.title: Using LangChain Agents and Tools to answer questions on the NBA with OpenAI
item.description: This article explores using LangChain Agents and Tools to answer questions on the NBA with OpenAI

item.title: Q&A Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with LangChain and Postgres
item.description: Explore how to implement Q&A Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) using LangChain and Postgres with the pgvector extension, leveraging LLMs for intelligent document querying.

item.title: Q&A Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with LangChain and Chroma
item.description: This article documents my experience exploring how to implement Q&A Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) using LangChain and the Chroma vector database.

item.title: Solving the Advent of Code 2022 calendar using my own programming language, santa-lang
item.description: Discover how I tackled the Advent of Code 2022 calendar using my own programming language, santa-lang - detailing its strengths, challenges, and improvements made along the way.

item.title: Designing santa-lang, a language for solving Advent of Code puzzles
item.description: This article documents my experience developing a functional, C-like programming language for solving Advent of Code puzzles.

item.title: Allocating Secret Santas using an AWS Step Function workflow and every available Lambda runtime
item.description: Documents my exploration into the many available Lambda runtimes, by way of orchestrating a Step Function workflow for allocating Secret Santas.

item.title: Building a Serverless Wedding Photo Gallery using AWS Lambda, S3 and DynamoDB
item.description: Explore how to build a serverless wedding photo gallery using AWS Lambda, S3, and DynamoDB, enabling guests to share high-quality photos effortlessly.

item.title: Solving the Advent of Code 2021 calendar on a Raspberry Pi Pico
item.description: Exploring how many Advent of Code 2021 solutions can run on a Raspberry Pi Pico using C and C++.

item.title: Solving the Advent of Code 2021 calendar using C in under half-a-second
item.description: Exploring the journey of solving the Advent of Code 2021 calendar in under half a second using the C programming language.

item.title: Deploying our Wedding Website onto a Raspberry Pi Kubernetes Cluster using K3s and Helm
item.description: Learn how to deploy a PHP web application on a Raspberry Pi Kubernetes cluster using K3s and Helm, covering setup, containerisation, Helm charts, and public access via SSL.

item.title: Containerising the DataDog Agent for HTTP health-checks using DigitalOcean App Platform and Terraform
item.description: Explore containerising the DataDog Agent for HTTP health-checks using DigitalOcean App Platform and Terraform, reducing infrastructure overhead while maintaining effective monitoring.

item.title: Can you name that AWS service?
item.description: A guide to building an AWS service icon quiz game using React and GitHub Actions.

item.title: Managing long-running AWS Fargate ECS tasks within your Serverless project
item.description: Explore how a Serverless Framework plugin bridges the gap between AWS Lambda and AWS Fargate, enabling seamless execution of long-running tasks alongside FaaS compute models.

item.title: Separating out the Lambda Bref runtime from your project's Composer dependencies
item.description: Learn how to isolate the Lambda Bref runtime from your project's Composer dependencies to avoid conflicts and ensure compatibility.

item.title: Using GitHub Actions to send Gone Live release notes via Email and Slack
item.description: Learn how to use GitHub Actions to automate the distribution of Gone Live release notes via Email and Slack, improving communication and reducing manual tasks.

item.title: Our Wedding Website, Three Years in the Making...
item.description: Because every wedding RSVP website needs to follow DDD, CQRS, Hexagonal Architecture, Event Sourcing, and be deployed on AWS Lambda.

item.title: Building a Secret Santa allocator and SMS sender using a Raspberry Pi Pico/MicroPython and SIM800L module
item.description: Learn how to build a Secret Santa allocator and SMS sender using a Raspberry Pi Pico, MicroPython, and a SIM800L module.

item.title: Building a 2FA TOTP generator using a Raspberry Pi Pico and MicroPython
item.description: Learn how to build a 2FA TOTP generator device using a Raspberry Pi Pico and MicroPython, including a display and customisable features.

item.title: Building a Rubik's Cube Solver using Rust/WASM and Three.js/React
item.description: Explore the process of building a Rubik's Cube (3x3x3) solver using Rust, WebAssembly (WASM), Three.js, and React.

item.title: Building an optimal Pocket Cube (2x2x2) Solver using Rust/WASM and Three.js/React
item.description: Explore the process of building an optimal Pocket Cube (2x2x2) solver using Rust, WebAssembly (WASM), Three.js, and React.

item.title: Building an Enigma Machine in Haskell
item.description: Explore the intricacies of creating an Enigma Machine in Haskell, utilising property-based testing to ensure correctness and robustness.

item.title: Building an Enigma Machine in ClojureScript
item.description: Learn how to build an Enigma Machine using ClojureScript and property-based testing. This comprehensive guide covers rotor simulation, reflector configuration, and a user interface using Reagent.

item.title: Creating a React-based Chess Game with WASM Bots in TypeScript
item.description: Learn how to build a React-based chess game integrated with WebAssembly (WASM) bots in TypeScript, utilising React Hooks, the UCI protocol and Yarn 2 features.

item.title: Binary Addition using Half and Full Adders within TypeScript
item.description: Discover how to implement binary addition in TypeScript using logic gates, half adders, and full adders for robust type safety and efficient computation.

item.title: The Mystery Calculator in ClojureScript and Reagent
item.description: Explore how to implement the Mystery Calculator, a classic Christmas cracker gift, using ClojureScript and Reagent with a clever binary trick.

item.title: Building a Nokia Composer (RTTTL) Player and WAV-file Generator in the Browser
item.description: Learn how to parse, play and generate WAV-files from Nokia (RTTTL) ringtones using the Web Audio API and JavaScript in the browser.

item.title: Allocating and Notifying Secret Santas via Email using Clojure
item.description: Discover how to build a Clojure console application with Leiningen that allocates Secret Santas and sends email notifications using Gmail SMTP.

item.title: Creating a Contact Tracing Scanner using Swift for macOS
item.description: Learn how to build a contact tracing scanner for macOS using Swift, Interface Builder, and Core Bluetooth with detailed instructions and code examples.

item.title: Creating a Contact Tracing Scanner using Web Bluetooth
item.description: Discover how to use the Web Bluetooth API to build a Contact Tracing Scanner web application.

item.title: Building a Flag Guessing Game using React Hooks
item.description: Learn how to build an interactive flag guessing game using React Hooks, Create React App, and Styled Components. Exploring game logic, state management, and deployment with GitHub Pages.

item.title: Adding Running Shoes (aka Speeding up walking) in Pokémon Red (pokered)
item.description: Learn how to add Running Shoes to Pokémon Red (pokered) for a faster walking experience without waiting for the Bicycle.

item.title: Changing the Starter Pokémon within Pokémon Red (pokered)
item.description: Learn how to customise the Starter Pokémon in Pokémon Red (pokered) by modifying the pokered source code for an enhanced gaming experience.

item.title: Creating a Time-lapse Camera with HypriotOS/Docker using a Raspberry Pi 3B+ and Raspberry Pi Zero W
item.description: Learn how to create a time-lapse camera using HypriotOS, Docker and Raspberry Pi devices. Discover step-by-step instructions and tips for building your own time-lapse camera.

item.title: Allocating Secret Santas with a Substitution Cipher using Clojure
item.description: Learn how to allocate Secret Santas using a substitution cipher in Clojure. Discover a step-by-step guide to grouping participants and concealing pairings with ROT13 for a secure and fun gift exchange.

item.title: Unlocking Tsunekazu Ishihara's team in Pokémon Red (pokered)
item.description: Discover how to unlock Tsunekazu Ishihara's team in Pokémon Red (pokered) with this comprehensive guide.

item.title: Compiling Pokémon Red (pokered) using Docker and adding 'Super B' button behaviour
item.description: Learn how to compile Pokémon Red with Docker, add custom 'Super B' button behaviour, and enhance your retro gaming experience. A step-by-step guide for enthusiasts.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Viewing and Removing Mince Pies with Amazon DynamoDB
item.description: A comprehensive guide to viewing and removing mince pies using Amazon DynamoDB as part of the Mince Pie Challenge API.

item.title: Creating a Command Line Application to Fetch URL Titles in Go
item.description: A comprehensive guide to developing a cross-platform command-line application in Go that fetches URL titles using concurrent programming techniques and Docker.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Adding and Listing Mince Pies with Amazon DynamoDB
item.description: Explore the process of adding and listing mince pies with Amazon DynamoDB using Lambda and offline development with DynamoDB Local.

item.title: How to Expand a Linux AWS EBS Root/Partition Volume without Rebooting
item.description: Expand your Linux AWS EBS root partition volume without rebooting using this comprehensive guide on growpart and resize2fs.

item.title: Setting up Caddy Server within AWS using Packer and Terraform
item.description: A detailed guide on setting up a secure Caddy Server within AWS using Packer and Terraform, with step-by-step instructions for HTTPS configuration and Infrastructure-as-Code implementation.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Adding the Bootstrap Endpoint and Serverless Offline
item.description: Discover how to implement a Bootstrap API endpoint and configure Serverless Offline for efficient local development.

item.title: Building a Babel Plugin: Adding a Function Composition Operator and Auto-Curried Functions to JavaScript
item.description: Learn how to build a Babel plugin that adds a function composition operator and auto-curried functions to JavaScript through detailed AST manipulation.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Adding Test Coverage using Jest and Travis CI
item.description: A comprehensive guide to enhancing your API project with test coverage using Jest and Travis CI, ensuring robust code quality and continuous integration.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Setting up Flow with Babel and Webpack
item.description: Learn how to set up Flow with Babel and Webpack to enhance code confidence and ensure type safety in your JavaScript project.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Authentication with Amazon Cognito and JSON Web Tokens
item.description: This technical post explains how to implement authentication with Amazon Cognito and JSON Web Tokens in a Serverless environment.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Setting up the Serverless Framework with Docker, Webpack and Babel
item.description: Learn how to set up the Serverless Framework with Docker, Webpack and Babel for building robust AWS Lambda functions as part of the Mince Pie Challenge.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Designing the RESTful API with RAML
item.description: Learn how to design a RESTful API using RAML for the Mince Pie Challenge with detailed guidelines, best practices and authentication strategies.

item.title: Mince Pie Challenge: Building a Serverless RESTful API and React Client
item.description: Guide to building a Serverless RESTful API and React Client using AWS services and modern development tools.

item.title: Determining if an IPv4 address is within a CIDR range in JavaScript
item.description: A comprehensive guide on determining if an IPv4 address lies within a CIDR range in JavaScript, featuring code examples and detailed explanations.

item.title: Insight into Site Reliability Engineering with Niall Murphy
item.description: Explore expert insights into Site Reliability Engineering with Niall Murphy, featuring discussions on error budgets, uptime challenges and the evolving DevOps landscape.

item.title: Setting up GitHub Pages HTTPS Custom Domains using CloudFront and Lambda@Edge
item.description: Learn how to set up HTTPS custom domains for GitHub Pages using CloudFront and Lambda@Edge in this comprehensive guide.

item.title: Unlocking the AWS WAF Logs
item.description: Unlock AWS WAF logs easily using Serverless, Lambda and AWS SDK to gain deep insights into your web application firewall and enhance security.

item.title: Creating a 'Winning' Audio Lambda Service using Serverless, Polly and compiled SOX
item.description: Learn how to build a 'Winning' audio Lambda service using the Serverless framework, AWS Polly and compiled SOX. This comprehensive guide covers compiling native code, integrating AWS services and generating dynamic audio outputs.

item.title: 'Memes as a Service' using Lambda, Serverless and ImageMagick
item.description: Learn how to create a 'Memes as a Service' platform using AWS Lambda, the Serverless Framework, and ImageMagick. A step-by-step guide with code examples.

item.title: Scheduling EC2 Instances using Lambda and CloudWatch Events
item.description: Learn how to schedule EC2 instances using AWS Lambda and CloudWatch Events to optimise costs and automate server management.

item.title: Using Homebrew to Manage Project Development Scripts
item.description: Learn how to use Homebrew to manage project development scripts efficiently and automate complex tasks with a custom Homebrew Tap and Formula.

item.title: Handling Retries and Back-off Attempts with JavaScript Promises
item.description: Learn how to handle retries and implement exponential back-off attempts with JavaScript Promises for more resilient asynchronous operations.

item.title: Managing Newlines and Unicode within JavaScript and PHP
item.description: Learn how to handle newline inconsistencies and Unicode character length differences between JavaScript and PHP to ensure accurate text processing.

item.title: Designing Immutable Concepts with Transient Mutation in PHP
item.description: Explore how transient mutation can optimise immutable concepts in PHP, improving performance while maintaining immutability.

item.title: Managing Background Processes within Symfony
item.description: Discover how to efficiently manage background processes within Symfony, leveraging Cron, Supervisor, and continuous process management techniques.

item.title: Using Constraint-based Ordering in PHP
item.description: Learn how to implement constraint-based ordering in PHP to evenly distribute shortlist fees in a dataset, improving aesthetics and readability.

item.title: Throttling and Debouncing Function Invocation in JavaScript
item.description: Learn the differences between throttling and debouncing in JavaScript, with practical examples and implementations for optimising function invocation in event handling.

item.description: Learn how to implement a self-balancing AVL binary search tree in Clojure, ensuring optimal search performance through automatic rebalancing.

item.description: Explore multiple efficient methods to solve anagrams using Clojure, including Hash-Map, Trie, and Prime Number approaches.

item.description: Explore the Maybe type in JavaScript, including its implementation and practical examples for safe handling of null and undefined values.

item.description: Learn how to use PHP's array_column function to re-index an array's keys effortlessly.

item.description: Creating simple podcast stats stored in YAML front-matter using PHP.

item.description: Learn how De Morgan's Laws help simplify logical propositions in programming by transforming predicates for better readability and intent.

item.description: Learn how to validate 32-bit signed integers in PHP with platform-agnostic methods, including filter_var and bitmasking techniques.

item.description: Learn how to convert binary, octal, and hexadecimal numbers to decimal using collection pipelines in JavaScript.

item.description: Learn how to use PostgreSQL to perform operations on a deck of cards using arrays, cross-joins, and CTEs.

item.description: Learn how to implement 'transpose' and 'zip' in JavaScript to manipulate multi-dimensional arrays effectively.

item.description: Learn how to use the 'IS (NOT) DISTINCT FROM' SQL comparators to handle NULL values effectively in SQL queries.

item.description: Learn how to maintain complex invariant constraints in PostgreSQL using trigger functions for enhanced data integrity.

item.description: Learn how to use PHP higher-order functions map, filter, and reduce to simplify and improve code readability.

item.description: Parsing an infix expression into its RPN counterpart using the Shunting Yard algorithm in JavaScript

item.description: Learn how to implement insertion, removal and inversion operations on binary search trees in PHP using both mutable and immutable approaches.
